name: MazeOn (DocGeraud)
description:
Try to survive as long as possible in this coop-platformer: 

  • Inhale radioactive plants 
  • Spit them out in the active pipes 
  • Don't let the machine run out of energy 
  • Help each other to access new areas and shortcuts 

J1 : left/right/up/down(suck) 

J2 : q/d/z/s(suck)

A game by:

@Goglilol: art/sound/music/level design

@DrGeraud: design/code/level design
